Chloe Chotrani

Dancing Landscapes

Dancing Landscapes is an embodied exploration with guided facilitation by Chloe. A space to let the body speak before the mind. We'll start by connecting within through a gentle awareness practice, listening deeply to our inner landscape. Making our way into movement to open the body into our wider biosphere, and leading into accessible, structured movement prompts to bring fluidity to our spine and increase our spatial awareness. By now, your body is warmed up and ready to improvise freely, deepening both internal and external connections.

We will get to know our own bodies deeper by understanding, expanding, and strengthening our range of motion. All with the intention to feel safe and free in our bodies, using movement as a gateway. All levels, abilities, and bodies are welcome.
